#summary Changelog for version 1.1 of ChBoSync.
#labels Changelog

=Changelog: Changes for version 1.1 of _ChBoSync_=

 * Improved translatable strings.

 * Changed _targetSDK_ for compiling from API level 19 to API 21 (but app should still work on devices with at least API level 15 of Android).



*Version 1.1 of _ChBoSync_ is to be released in 2015Q1.*
